meanings: [명사] pledge, promise, commitment, [동사] pledge (oneself), promise, make a promise[pledge, commitment]

vlive.korean: 공약. A heart pledge. 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [루다] HAPPY LUDA DAY 🎂
런웨이 공약 어때요? - 좋아요 좋아요! What do you think about a runway promise? - I like it! 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: What do you think about a runway promise? - I like it!

vlive.korean: 어떤 공약? - 어떤 공약? For example? - What would you do? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : [FULL] 슈퍼주니어의 2YA2YAO! LIVE @ SJ THE STAGE
vlive.english: For example? - What would you do?

vlive.korean: 4억 공약 아닌가요? isn't it a pledge for 400 million hearts? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] KIM WOO SEOK X LieV - 김우석의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: isn't it a pledge for 400 million hearts?

vlive.korean: 다음부터 저 이런 공약 절대 하지 않을게요 - 2, 3! I'll never suggest things like this ever again. - 2, 3! 듣기 View video GOT7 : 눈 덩어리💚
vlive.english: I'll never suggest things like this ever again. - 2, 3!

examples.korean: He had dishonoured nearly all of his election pledges. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 거의 모든 선거 공약을 지키지 않았었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had dishonoured nearly all of his election pledges. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They have signally failed to keep their election promises. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 선거 공약을 분명히 지키지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They have signally failed to keep their election promises. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The government had retreated from its pledge to reduce class sizes. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정부가 학급 규모를 줄이겠다던 공약에서 물러선 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government had retreated from its pledge to reduce class sizes. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The government will not be deflected from its commitments. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정부는 무슨 일이 있어도 공약을 실현할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government will not be deflected from its commitments. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This is a serious dilution of their election promises. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이것은 그들의 선거 공약이 심각하게 약화된 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This is a serious dilution of their election promises. Add to Wordbook
